'''Coa''' is an open-world [[NPC]] located in {{Location|Stadium of the Sacred Flame}}. She can be found talking to [[Coyopa (Open-World)|Coyopa]].

==Trivia==
===Etymology===
* In {{W|Inca Mythology}}, Coa or Qhoa was a winged feline deity that brought rain, storms, rainbows, and hail.
